conbody.p: This mode allows the teacher to black out and lock the screen, as well as block keyboard and mouse input for computers of an individual student, group, or the whole class. Upon initiation of this mode you will be given a chance to specify a message displayed on the locked screens ( ).

fig.title: Specifying a message to be displayed on locked out screens

image.alt: Specifying a message to be displayed on locked out screens

conbody.p: Select Lock computer from the student menu (see ) to lock a single computer.
Press Remote control button in the group tab menu (see ) and select Lock computer to lock computers of a group of students.
Press Remote control in the class tab menu (see ) and select Lock computer to lock all computers in the class.
Repeat described above actions to release the lock.
